column4: hey guys, i have a bash question. i have a big folder containing several other sub folders containing many different file types. i want to copy only the .mp3 files to another location without having to go through that manually. is there a bash command to do that like cp ?
Substitute your root path where I put in "."
My usage of find will flatten everything. If you want to preserve the folder structure, it will take a little more.
